default.title: Waterfall
default.description: When you start drinking, everyone must continue drinking until you stop.

red.title: Waterfall
red.description: When you start drinking, everyone must continue drinking until you stop. Minimum of 5 seconds.

black.title: Waterfall
black.description: When %rplayer starts drinking, everyone must continue drinking until they stop.

default.title: Nursery
default.description: Everyone younger than you must drink.

red.title: Charity
red.description: Feel charitable and give out 2 drinks to the group.

black.title: Drink Miser
black.description: Take 2 drinks for being such a hoarder.

default.title: Nursing Home
default.description: Everyone older than you must drink.

red.title: Charity
red.description: Feel charitable and give out 3 drinks to the group.

black.title: Drink Miser
black.description: Take 3 drinks for being such a hoarder.

default.title: Loose Women
default.description: Girls loosen up! It's time to drink up.

red.title: Loose Women
red.description: Girls loosen up! It's time to drink up.

black.title: Picky Choosers
black.description: Girls in the group, vote on the lad who needs to drink.

default.title: Socialise
default.description: Share your pain! Everyone drink up!

red.title: Socialise
red.description: Share your pain! Everyone drink up!

black.title: Socialise
black.description: Share your pain! Everyone drink up!

default.title: Dads Army!
default.description: Lads loosen up! It's time to drink up.

red.title: Dads Army!
red.description: Lads loosen up! It's time to drink up.

black.title: Picky Choosers
black.description: Lads in the group, vote on the girl who needs to drink.

default.title: Heaven
default.description: Everyone point to the sky! Last one to point, drinks up.

red.title: Heaven
red.description: Everyone point to the sky! Last one to point, drinks up.

black.title: Hell
black.description: Everyone point to the ground! Last one to point, drinks up.

default.title: Date
default.description: Pick someone to drink with you for the rest of the game.

red.title: Date
red.description: Pick someone to drink with you for the rest of the game.

black.title: Date
black.description: Pick someone to drink with you for the rest of the game.

default.title: Rhyme
default.description: Pick a word to rhyme. Go around the group and rhyme with it. First to fail, drinks.

red.title: Democracy
red.description: Everyone vote on who to drink. Person with the most votes, drinks.

black.title: Wildcard
black.description:
Pick a random card to play.
Mercy? Never.

default.title: Categories
default.description:
Pick a category to riff off.
Hesitate, you drink.

red.title: Categories
red.description:
Pick a category to riff off.
Hesitate, you drink.

black.title: Categories
black.description:
Pick a category to riff off.
Hesitate, you drink.

default.title: Thumb Master
default.description: Whenever you put your thumb up, everyone must do the same. Last to do so, drinks.

red.title: Thumb Master
red.description: Whenever you put your thumb up, everyone must do the same. Last to do so, drinks.

black.title: Thumb Master
black.description: Whenever you put your thumb up, everyone must do the same. Last to do so, drinks.

default.title: Question Master
default.description:
Ask people questions until you are dethroned
Failure to answer is a drink.

red.title: Question Master
red.description:
Ask people questions until you are dethroned
Failure to answer is a drink.

black.title: Question Master
black.description:
Ask people questions until you are dethroned
Failure to answer is a drink.

default.title: Rule Master
default.description:
Make a new rule for the group.
Anyone that breaks it drinks.

red.title: Rule Master
red.description:
Make a new rule for the group.
Anyone that breaks it drinks.

black.title: Rule Master
black.description:
Make a new rule for the group.
Anyone that breaks it drinks.

rules.title: Tap your Head
rules.description: Before you drink, you must tap your head

rules.title: Mr. Worldwide
rules.description: For the rest of the game, everyone must talk in a accent

rules.title: Forced Marriage
rules.description: Dates are now reversible. If they drink, you drink.

rules.title: 2 Shots of Vodka
rules.description: After completing a waterfall, pick someone to drink for an extra 5 seconds.

rules.title: Trust Excercise
rules.description: Pick a buzzword. If anyone else but you says it, everyone drinks.

rules.title: Double
rules.description: Drinks are now doubled to a max of 4 drinks.

rules.title: Christian Server
rules.description: No swearing on my christian Minecraft server!

rules.title: Even Numbers
rules.description: If you have to drink on an even card, you drink double.

rules.title: Odd Numbers
rules.description: If you have to drink on an odd card, you drink double.

rules.title: SAS
rules.description: Give each other a nickname. If you refer to them with their name, you drink.

rules.title: Mystic Meg
rules.description: Before picking your next card, predict the cards colour. If you get it wrong, you drink, otherwise pick someone to drink.

rules.title: Hummingbirds
rules.description: During waterfall, everyone must hum a tune whilst drinking.

truths: Which player do you like the most?
Who do you hate the most in group?
What is a dirty secret about you?
How much drink have you had?
What#s a controversial opinion you have?
Have you ever lied to smoeone in the group and who?
Have you ever lied about your age?
What is your greatest fear in a relationship?
